subject: Soccer
Assaults
Gangs
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: Much of the problem can be traced to hostilities between rival factions of barra bravas, the Argentine version of hooligan fan groups that operate like mini-mafias.
snippet: Much of the problem can be traced to hostilities between rival factions of barra bravas, the Argentine version of hooligan fan groups that operate like mini-mafias.
